I say this as someone who shot my 1st gun at 6 years old. I grew up in rural Alabama and my Grandpa was a hunter and had lots of guns. I‚Äôm also an expert marksman. 

To put your 2nd amendment rights above the right for my 2nd grader to live is unconscionable. #ProtectOurKidsAct

My 6 year old explained to me how they practice what to do if bad guys come into his class. I cried.

Unbelievable that we have anyone considered to be a leader in this country still not willing to protect children at schools.

üßµ

üßµ

üßµ
